content.description: Sunshine Falls is the Westmost route on the Waterfall Boulder. It has fun sequences and is pretty straightforward.
content.location: The Waterfall Boulder is located somewhat in the middle of the Slick Rock Gardens area, to the east of the Stately Boulder. You know this boulder because it looks like a waterfall of slick rock. Look for the plaque with Sunshine Falls.

content.description: This is the far east route on the Waterfall Boulder.
content.location: The Waterfall Boulder is located somewhat in the center of the Slick Rock Gardens, just East of the Stately Boulder. Look for the boulder that looks like a waterfall of slick rock. Also, look for the plaque that says, Rifle Falls.

content.description: Climb the south arete of the Mushroom Boulder.
content.location: The Mushroom Boulder is located in the far lower south-west of the Slick Rock Gardens.

content.description: Mr. Frog is an easy boulder problem on the Southwest side of the Stately Boulder.
content.location: This route is located on the Stately Boulder, just South of the Bat Cave Boulder in the Slick Rock Garden area. Look for a plaque with the name and info on it.

content.description: The Man Himself is a fun V1 problem on the Higgenbottom Boulder.
content.location: This route is located on the Higgenbottom Boulder within the Slick Rock Gardens. The Higgenbottom Boulder is on the East side of Slick Rock Gardens. Look for the plaque with the name The Man Himself.

content.description: The Legend of Silver Heels is an easy and fun boulder problem on the Higgenbottom Boulder.
content.location: This route is located on the Higgenbottom Boulder within the Slick Rock Gardens. The Higgenbottom Boulder is the bigger boulder on the East end of the Slick Rock Gardens. Look for a plaque with the name The Legend of Silver Heels.

content.description: In Your Head is a fun V1 on the Brain Boulder located in the Slick Rock Gardens.
content.location: This route is located on the Brain Boulder within Slick Rock Gardens. The Brain Boulder is located in the middle of the Slick Rock Gardens. There is no plaque for this route yet.

content.description: Higgenbottom Blues is a fun and easy climb on the Higgenbottom Boulder.
content.location: This route is located on the Higgenbottom Boulder within the Slick Rock Gardens. The Higgenbottom Boulder is on the East side of Slick Rock Gardens. Look for the plaque with the name Higgenbottom Blues.

content.description: Glacier Postcards is a fun route on the tallest part of the Stately Boulder.
content.location: The Stately Boulder is located furthest west in the Slick Rock Gardens area, and just South of the Bat Cave boulder. Glacier Postcards is the southernmost-facing route on the Stately Boulder.

content.description: Geronimo is an easy problem on the far East side of the Slick Rock Gardens. Geronimo!
content.location: This route is located on the Geronimo Boulder within the Slick Rock Gardens. The Geronimo Boulder is on the far East side of Slick Rock Gardens. Look for the plaque with the name Geronimo.

content.description: Frontal Attachment is a fun problem on the Southern arete of the Brain Boulder.
content.location: This route is located on the Brain Boulder within Slick Rock Gardens. The Brain Boulder is located in the middle of the Slick Rock Gardens. There is no plaque for this route yet.

content.description: Finger Fissure is a fun boulder problem to the right of South arete on the Brain Boulder.
content.location: This route is located on the Brain Boulder within the Slick Rock Gardens. The Brain Boulder is in the center of the Slick Rock Gardens. There is not a plaque for this route yet.

content.description: Einstein's Idea is an easy and fun V1 on the Brain Boulder within the Slick Rock Gardens.
content.location: This route is located on the Brain Boulder within Slick Rock Gardens. The Brain Boulder is located in the middle of the Slick Rock Gardens. There is no plaque for this route yet.

content.description: DWS is a fun, little boulder problem on the Stately Boulder. Sit start, and top out!
content.location: This route is located on the far west side of Slick Rock Gardens at the Stately Boulder. This route is on the East side of the boulder. Look for the plaque with DWS on it.

content.description: This is the center route on the Waterfall Boulder.
content.location: The Waterfall Boulder is located somewhat in the center of Slick Rock Gardens, and just East of the Stately Boulder. Look for the boulder that looks like a waterfall of slick rock. Also, look for the Plaque that says, Buckskin Falls.

content.description: Buckskin Clothing is an easy problem on the Higgenbottom Boulder.
content.location: This route is located on the Higgenbottom Boulder within the Slick Rock Gardens. The Higgenbottom Boulder is on the East side of Slick Rock Gardens. Look for the plaque with the name Buckskin Clothing.

content.description: Brain Crimps is a fun V3 on the Brain Boulder.
content.location: This route is located on the Brain Boulder within Slick Rock Gardens. The Brain Boulder is located in the middle of the Slick Rock Gardens. There is no plaque for this route yet.

content.description: Climb this easy boulder problem to the top out.
content.location: The UFO Boulder is located next to the Stately Boulder. Look for the plaque with Belgium Wave on it.

content.description: This climb had a goal of topping out feet first originally. Riley Reed did just that while getting the FA. Try it out!
content.location: Look for the boulder furthest west with a slight overhang. This is the Bat Cave Boulder. The only problem on this boulder is the Bat Hang.

content.description: 1850s is an easy problem on the Higgenbottom Boulder.
content.location: This route is located on the Higgenbottom Boulder within the Slick Rock Gardens. The Higgenbottom Boulder is on the East side of Slick Rock Gardens. Look for the plaque with the name 1850s.
